channel.title: Github on Kasper
channel.description: Recent content in Github on Kasper

item.title: Hugo Hosted on Github
item.description: Prepare before deploying Hugo as a personal home page hosted on Github, there are some basic steps to complete: a Git version greater than v2.8. a Github Pages, e.g. <Username>.github.io. install Hugo . Deploying step by step to deploy: create a new repository e.g. blog to maintain Hugo’s content (personal blogs) and other source files. git clone <new repository> to your workspace and go into the path e.
